Constructor Detail

Vertex

public Vertex(int index,
              float x,
              float y,
              float z)
Creates a vertex with all coordinates in 3D space and stuff. It also has an index. Yes it has!

Parameters:
index - The vertex index.
x - The x position.
y - The y position.
z - The z position.

copyToBuffers

public final void copyToBuffers(IntBuffer vertices,
                                IntBuffer colors)
Copies vertex and color values to the corresponding native buffers, to be drawn by Open GL ES.

Parameters:
vertices - The vertices native buffer.
colors - The color native buffer.
